title.en: Aspiration for the Stages of the Path

text.en: Through my enduring efforts to amass the two accumulations
text.en-trans: der ni ring du bé lé tsok nyi ni

text.en: Extensively, on a vast, space-like scale,
text.en-trans: kha tar yangpa gangzhik sakpa dé

text.en: May I become a lord of the victorious ones,
text.en-trans: lo mik marik gi dong drowa kün

text.en: A guide for all beings mentally blinded by ignorance.
text.en-trans: namdren gyalwé wangwor dak gyur chik

text.en: Until then, throughout the course of my lives,
text.en-trans: der masönpé tserab küntu yang

text.en: May Mañjughoṣa guide me with his loving care,
text.en-trans: jampé yang kyi tsewé jezung té

text.en: And may I delight the buddhas through finding and practising
text.en-trans: tenpé rimpa kün tsang lam gyi chok

text.en: The supreme path in which every phase of teaching is complete.
text.en-trans: nyé né drubpé gyal nam nyé jé shok

text.en: May I teach the key points of this path as I have realized them,
text.en-trans: rang gi jizhin tokpé lam gyi né

text.en: With skilful means and inspired by intense affection,
text.en-trans: shuk drak tsewé drangpé tabkhé kyi

text.en: And, having thereby banished the darkness that engulfs beings' minds,
text.en-trans: drowé yi kyi münpa sal jé né

text.en: May I long uphold the teachings of the victorious buddhas!
text.en-trans: gyalwé tenpa ring du dzin gyur chik

text.en: Where the supreme, precious teachings one is yet to find,
text.en-trans: tenpa rinchen chok gi makhyabpa am

text.en: Or where they were once known, but have since declined,
text.en-trans: khyab kyang nyampar gyurpé chok der ni

text.en: There, through Great Compassion, may I stir people's minds,
text.en-trans: nyingjé chenpö yi rab kyöpa yi

text.en: And cause the treasury of benefit and happiness to shine!
text.en-trans: pendé ter dé salwar jepar shok

text.en: Through the gradual stages of the path to enlightenment,
text.en-trans: sé ché gyalwé mejung trinlé lé

text.en: Forged through the wondrous activity of buddhas and their heirs,
text.en-trans: lek drub changchub lam gyi rimpé kyang

text.en: May I bring splendour to the minds of those seeking freedom,
text.en-trans: tar dö nam kyi yi la pal ter zhing

text.en: And long may I cultivate the deeds of the victorious ones!
text.en-trans: gyalwé dzepa ring du kyong gyur chik

text.en: May I create circumstances conducive to this excellent path
text.en-trans: lamzang drikpé tünkyen drubjé ching

text.en: And dispel any impediments; may no-one, human or otherwise,
text.en-trans: galkyen sel jé mi dang mi min kün

text.en: Ever be separated from this utterly pure path,
text.en-trans: tserab küntu gyalwé ngakpa yi

text.en: Which is lauded by the victorious ones.
text.en-trans: namdak lam dang dralwar magyur chik

text.en: As I diligently apply myself to the genuine practice
text.en-trans: gang tsé tekpa chok la chöchö chü

text.en: Of the ten Dharma activities1of the supreme vehicle,
text.en-trans: tsulzhin drub la tsönpa dé yi tsé

text.en: May I always be assisted by those with mighty force,
text.en-trans: tuden nam kyi taktu drok jé ching

text.en: And may an ocean of auspiciousness pervade all directions!
text.en-trans: tashi gyatsö chok künkhyab gyur chik
